meanings.definition: Relating to meaning in language or logic.
meanings.sent1: The sematic analysis of the text helped us understand its deeper message.
meanings.sent2: Her sematic explanation clarified the confusing concept for the students.
meanings.sent3: The sematic puzzle was challenging but fun to solve.
meanings.sent4: His sematic approach to problem-solving was both innovative and effective.
meanings.sent5: The sematic significance of the symbol was profound and thought-provoking.

meanings.sent1: The sematic rules govern how words are used in sentences.
meanings.sent2: She conducted a sematic analysis of the language patterns in the text.
meanings.sent3: The sematic debate sparked interesting discussions among the linguists.
meanings.sent4: His sematic understanding of the language nuances set him apart as a skilled communicator.
meanings.sent5: The sematic structure of the sentence determined its overall meaning.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the study of meaning in language.
meanings.sent1: The sematic research focused on the interpretation of words in context.
meanings.sent2: Their sematic study revealed fascinating insights into language comprehension.
meanings.sent3: The sematic investigation led to unexpected discoveries about word meanings.
meanings.sent4: Her sematic expertise made her a valuable resource for language analysis.
meanings.sent5: The sematic exploration of the text uncovered hidden layers of significance.
